wallet.token.title: Token Details
wallet.details.tip: We recommend you to provide a well descriptive Title and/or an extra Note, so that you can remember and recall this wallet in future.
wallet.details.mnemonic.phrase.descripto:
Mnemonic Phrase is the "root key" of you wallet. From this "root key", all your addresses and the private keys in this wallet can be derived.So, you should NEVER reveal the Mnemonic Phrase to others, and be extreamly cautious in copy/paste your Mnemonic Phrase. 

You can trust ZeroPass to save and protect your Mnemonic Phrase, as they are encrypted by yourself and kept in your own vault.
wallet.details.address.descripton:
You can add multiple Crypto (Ethereum) addresses into one list, so that you could easily view and monitor them in one consolidated dashboard. 

If the addresses belong to you (you have the private key), you can save the private keys here, so that you could run batch transactions automatically in future. 

You should never reveal your private keys to others.
wallet.mnemonicReveal.title: Reveal - Mnemonic Phrase
wallet.tool.mnemonicExport.title: Retrive Addresses and Private Keys By Mnemonic Phrase
